reviews.review_msg: Maddie is a real gem of a prof. She is caring and so respectful that STUDENT'S HAVE LIVES OUTSIDE OF CLASS! She does give a lot of work and there are readings to do, but honestly, it's not that bad because of how awesome she is. I learned so much in class and 100% recommend her if you want a strict but fun prof.

Maddie was useless, she would hand back assignments after another one was due so you could not use the feedback to improve. Also she takes forever to mark. She is a tough marker. This class felt like a chore to go to. I would not take another class with her again. I swapped another class for this one,biggest mistake ever.
This class was interesting however, the prof was such a hard marker! She also was not helpful and is very condescending and rude. Dont take this class ever with this prof!
